sentences.en: Bacteria under the microscope, even those with no flagella, often bounce about in the water.
sentences.cn: 在显微镜下，细菌，甚至包括那些没有鞭毛的细菌，经常在水中跳来跳去。

sentences.en: Bacterial flagella are thread - like appendages composed entirely of protein.
sentences.cn: 完全由蛋白质构成的一种丝 状 的附属结构.

sentences.en: Certain eukaryotic cells can swim freely in liquid environments, propelled by whip like cilia or flagella.
sentences.cn: 某些真核细胞能在液体液体中自由运动,由纤毛或鞭毛推动.

sentences.en: Many protoctistans are motile , using pseudopodia, cilia or flagella.
sentences.cn: 许多原生动物利用伪足 、 纤毛或鞭毛能运动.

sentences.en: Microtubules are also used in the construction of centrioles , basal bodies , cilia and flagella.
sentences.cn: 微管还用于建造中心粒,基体, 纤毛和鞭毛.

sentences.en: Other proteins are appendages of single cells, called flagella or cilia or pill.
sentences.cn: 其它蛋白是单细胞的附属物, 移动鞭毛、纤毛或毛发.

sentences.en: The flagella rotate, pushing the bacteria through the water.
sentences.cn: 鞭毛不断旋转从而推动细菌在水中前行.

sentences.en: The length of the flagella is about 1.5 times as the cell diameter.
sentences.cn: 两条鞭毛稍不等长,着生于细胞前端,鞭毛长约为细胞直径的1.倍.

sentences.en: The rotation of flagella pushes the bacteria through the water.
sentences.cn: 鞭毛的旋转可以推动细菌在水中行进。

sentences.en: The shape and flagella of zoospores were observed by stainning method.
sentences.cn: 用染色法观察了游动孢子的形状和鞭毛.

sentences.en: Thus 15th Century tree rings become an argument against the Kyoto Protocol, just as bacterial flagella are whipped into service when discussing the role of religion in public life.
sentences.cn: 因此，15世纪树的年轮 成为反对京都协议的争论，就好像当讨论到宗教在公众生活中的角色时，细菌鞭毛被迅速投入使用。
